mapper.select: SELECT rvs.reserveId as reserveId, b.boardNm as boardNm, b.boardId as boardId, cc.cateNm as cateNm, c.contentId as contentId, c.contentNm as contentNm, rvs.regDt as regDt, r.rentalStat as rentalStat FROM ( SELECT rv.reserveId as reserveId, rv.contentId as contentId, rv.regDt as regDt FROM Reservation rv WHERE rv.reserveUserId = #{userId} and rv.delYn = 'N') rvs LEFT JOIN Content c ON c.contentId = rvs.contentId LEFT JOIN Board b ON b.boardId = c.boardId LEFT JOIN ContentCategory cc ON cc.cateId = c.cateId LEFT JOIN Rental r ON r.contentId = c.contentId Order by regDt desc;
SELECT delYn FROM Reservation WHERE contentId = ${contentId} ORDER BY modfDt DESC LIMIT 1
